verbs.description: At least three states [V: have] removed National Guard troops from the border in response to the Trump administration 's " zero tolerance " policy 's impact on families , and several other states say they are unwilling to send troops to aid the border security effort .

[ARG0: At least three states] have [V: removed] [ARG1: National Guard troops] [ARG2: from the border] [ARGM-CAU: in response to the Trump administration 's " zero tolerance " policy 's impact on families] , and several other states say they are unwilling to send troops to aid the border security effort .

At least three states have removed National Guard troops from the border in response to the Trump administration 's " zero tolerance " policy 's impact on families , and [ARG0: several other states] [V: say] [ARG1: they are unwilling to send troops to aid the border security effort] .
